INFO: LFS 252 (or FRST 231 or BIOL 300 or STAT 200)
1 Note CHEM 111 is not for students with Chemistry 12.
2 Students who have not completed Calculus 12 must take MATH 180 or 184 to fulfill their first year Math requirement.
3 Students without credit for Physics 12 must take PHYS 100 before taking other 100-level PHYS courses.
4 To be selected from Restricted Electives list in consultation with a program advisor.
5 Credit will be given for only one of ECON 310, LFS 101,  or ECON 101.
6 A minimum of 45 credits of the 123 or 124 credits required for the Major must be for courses numbered 300 or higher.
7 Students may present more than the required total credits depending on electives selected.
